Posts.Content: movinnshakin wrote: Does it suddenly appear one day? I have a small red area with tiny hard spot under skin - smaller than a pea. First couple days it looked like a large pimple because there was almost a whitehead but that's gone now. It's been about 8 days since I first saw redness. Location is near nipple.
